memberdef.name: wxOwnerDrawnComboBox

briefdescription.para: Constructor, creating and showing a owner-drawn combobox.

parameterdescription.para: Parent window. Must not be NULL.
Window identifier. The value wxID_ANY indicates a default value.
Initial selection string. An empty string indicates no selection.
Window position.
Window size. If wxDefaultSize is specified then the window is sized appropriately.
Number of strings with which to initialise the control.
An array of strings with which to initialise the control.
Window style. See wxOwnerDrawnComboBox.
Window validator.
Window name.

Returns width of the widest item in the list.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDC &dc, const wxRect &rect, int item, int flags) const
memberdef.name: OnDrawBackground

briefdescription.para: This method is used to draw the items background and, maybe, a border around it.

detaileddescription.para: The base class version implements a reasonable default behaviour which consists in drawing the selected item with the standard background colour and drawing a border around the item if it is either selected or current.

simplesect.para: flags has the same meaning as with OnDrawItem().

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDC &dc, const wxRect &rect, int item, int flags) const
memberdef.name: OnDrawItem

briefdescription.para: The derived class may implement this function to actually draw the item with the given index on the provided DC.

detaileddescription.para: If function is not implemented, the item text is simply drawn, as if the control was a normal combobox.

parameterdescription.para: The device context to use for drawing
The bounding rectangle for the item being drawn (DC clipping region is set to this rectangle before calling this function)
The index of the item to be drawn
A combination of the wxOwnerDrawnComboBoxPaintingFlags enumeration values.

briefdescription.para: The derived class may implement this method to return the height of the specified item (in pixels).

detaileddescription.para: The default implementation returns text height, as if this control was a normal combobox.

briefdescription.para: The derived class may implement this method to return the width of the specified item (in pixels).

detaileddescription.para: If -1 is returned, then the item text width is used.

briefdescription.para: wxOwnerDrawnComboBox is a combobox with owner-drawn list items.

detaileddescription.para: In essence, it is a wxComboCtrl with wxVListBox popup and wxControlWithItems interface.
Implementing item drawing and measuring is similar to wxVListBox. Application needs to subclass wxOwnerDrawnComboBox and implement OnDrawItem(), OnMeasureItem() and OnMeasureItemWidth().

This class supports the following styles:
wxODCB_DCLICK_CYCLES: Double-clicking cycles item if wxCB_READONLY is also used. Synonymous with wxCC_SPECIAL_DCLICK.
wxODCB_STD_CONTROL_PAINT: Control itself is not custom painted using OnDrawItem. Even if this style is not used, writable wxOwnerDrawnComboBox is never custom painted unless SetCustomPaintWidth() is called.
wxComboCtrl window styles and Window Styles. Events emitted by this class

The following event handler macros redirect the events to member function handlers 'func' with prototypes like: voidhandlerFuncName(wxCommandEvent&event)Event macros for events emitted by this class:
EVT_COMBOBOX(id, func): Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_COMBOBOX_SELECTED event, when an item on the list is selected. Note that calling GetValue() returns the new value of selection.
Events emitted by wxComboCtrl.
